mapper.select: SELECT R.RESV_NO AS RESV_NO, R.PAYMENT AS PAYMENT, R.RESV_DT AS RESV_DT, R.MEMBER_ID AS MEMBER_ID, R.CLASS_NO AS CLASS_NO, C.CLASS_NM AS CLASS_NM FROM RESERVATIONS R, CLASS C WHERE R.CLASS_NO = C.CLASS_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERVATIONS ( PAYMENT, RESV_ALARM, RESV_DT, CLASS_NO, MEMBER_ID ) VALUES ( #{payment}, #{resvAlarm}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d'), #{classNo}, #{memberId} )
